attributes.action: Make the local council to pay half of the repairs on shared ownership homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the rise in the cost of household bills I feel that local councils should pay half off the repairs that need to be done on shared ownership homes that have not got a service charge.I feel that the council are going to benefit from any modernisation of the properties and therefore making profit on the sale of the home
